com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store

Class StoresImpl<K extends EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.Stores<K,E>
      • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store.StoresImpl<K,E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StartAndStoppable

    public abstract class StoresImpl<K extends EntryKey,E extends StoredEntry<K>>
extends Stores<K,E>
implements StartAndStoppable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected AtomicBoolean _active
      Marker flag used to indicate whether this store is currently active and able to process things.
      protected StoredEntryConverter<K,E,?> _entryConverter
      We also need a factory for converting keys, entries.
      protected com.fasterxml.storemate.store.StorableStore _entryStore
      Separately managed StorableStore that handles actual entry storage details.
      protected String _initProblem
      Error message used to indicate why initialization failed, if it did.
      protected com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper _jsonMapper 
      protected LastAccessConfig _lastAccessConfig 
      protected com.fasterxml.storemate.shared.TimeMaster _timeMaster 
      protected static int DEFAULT_LAST_ACCESS_LOCK_TABLES
      Last-access table may get rather high concurrency as it may be updated for every GET request, so let's boost from 1 to reasonably high prime number.
